DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether difference gene cod liver enzyme carboxylesterase 1 ( CES1 ) mean difference metabolism methylphenidate , CES1 dependent drug .
DOC.criteria: > 18 year old Caucasian Chronic disease ( except hay fever eczema ) Pregnancy Smoking High level alcohol consumption ( > 21 unit per week men 14 woman ) Known allergy towards methylphenidate Permanent use medication ( contraception ok )
